items.title: South Korea Quitting Coal Will Hurt US LNG and Australian Coal Exports

items.title: Electric Vehicles and Nuclear Power Are Fighting Over One Obscure Mineral
items.summary: The energy transition is often sold as a story of ethereal "green" progress, but if you look at the balance sheets of the companies actually building it, the story is written in soot and high-voltage electricity. While the financial press spends its

items.title: Protests Push Iran Into a New Phase of Turmoil
items.summary: Iran's leadership is facing mounting pressure from abroad and emerging dissent from within as street protests over its reeling economy and the threat of a new round of military strikes hang over the country. Demonstrations were reported in several ci
